objects.text: • HAND-CRAFTED PREMIUM LEATHER • CUSHIONED COMFORT • BOHEMIAN DESIGN

product_details.name: Enchanted Desert Walker: Artisan Leather Sneakers with Boho-Inspired Design
product_details.description:
• Hand-crafted premium leather construction with unique tribal-inspired detailing
• Comfortable cushioned insole with light blue interior lining
• Decorative scalloped pattern and artistic stitching along the sides
• Durable rubber sole with bubble texture for enhanced grip
• Rustic brown leather laces complementing the desert-toned leather
• Distinctive toe cap design with intricate decorative elements
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day comfort
• Perfect blend of bohemian style and modern sneaker comfort
• Available in natural tan and cream color combination
• Ideal for casual wear and artistic fashion statements

banner_details:
This banner features a warm, earthy design with a rustic and artisan aesthetic. The background showcases a smooth gradient with soft wave patterns and abstract elements, enhanced by a central circular gradient to highlight the product. Positioned at the center is an intricately designed leather sneaker image (`product_image`), complemented by a bold, curved heading (`heading`) and a smaller subheading (`subheading`) indicating the product type. A circular price badge (`price`) is overlaid on the right. Feature highlights are listed in a fine row (`description`) near the bottom. A prominent rectangular button (`cta_background`) with "SHOP NOW" text (`cta`) serves as the call to action.

**Color Palette:**
- Sandy Beige: `#E6C9A8`
- Rustic Brown: `#C28C60`
- Clay Brown: `#A36B3E`
- Deep Mahogany: `#773C1F`
- Rich Coffee: `#5D3021`
- Accent Orange-Brown: `#B25C2E`
- Highlight White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a uniquely designed shoe blending warm earth tones and creamy neutrals. Dominant hues include a soft beige (#F5D7A0), warm caramel brown (#C76B2E), burnt orange (#B84E19), and light tan (#EAD3B5). These colors are smoothly blended in layers, with gradients and textural transitions for a handcrafted, artisan look. Accents of white (#FDF7ED) highlight contours and intricate patterns, adding depth and emphasis. The shoe’s design integrates these colors cohesively—burnt orange laces contrast with the light body, and warm brown soles ground the look. This palette evokes warmth, creativity, and authenticity—ideal for a vibrant, cozy advertisement banner.
